remarks: Lemma for proof of part 14 in [Baer] p. 50.  (Contributed by NM, 6-Jun-2015.)
statement:
hdmap14lem12.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
hdmap14lem12.u $e |- U = ( ( DVecH ` K ) ` W ) $.
hdmap14lem12.v $e |- V = ( Base ` U ) $.
hdmap14lem12.t $e |- .x. = ( .s ` U ) $.
hdmap14lem12.r $e |- R = ( Scalar ` U ) $.
hdmap14lem12.b $e |- B = ( Base ` R ) $.
hdmap14lem12.c $e |- C = ( ( LCDual ` K ) ` W ) $.
hdmap14lem12.e $e |- .xb = ( .s ` C ) $.
hdmap14lem12.s $e |- S = ( ( HDMap ` K ) ` W ) $.
hdmap14lem12.k $e |- ( ph -> ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) ) $.
hdmap14lem12.f $e |- ( ph -> F e. B ) $.
hdmap14lem12.p $e |- P = ( Scalar ` C ) $.
hdmap14lem12.a $e |- A = ( Base ` P ) $.
hdmap14lem12.o $e |- .0. = ( 0g ` U ) $.
hdmap14lem12.x $e |- ( ph -> X e. ( V \ { .0. } ) ) $.
hdmap14lem12.g $e |- ( ph -> G e. A ) $.
hdmap14lem13 $p |- ( ph -> ( ( S ` ( F .x. X ) ) = ( G .xb ( S ` X ) ) <-> A. y e. V ( S ` ( F .x. y ) ) = ( G .xb ( S ` y ) ) ) ) $.
$d .0. y $.
$d .x. y $.
$d .xb y $.
$d A y $.
$d F y $.
$d G y $.
$d S y $.
$d U y $.
$d V y $.
$d X y $.
$d ph y $.
